title: Lead Product Designer
description: Led the creation, documentation, and implementation of the design system in Internxt, using Figma, Storybook, and TailwindCSS, achieving a 60% reduction in frontend development time and code review.
Led UX Research, UI prototyping, Service Design and UI Design for multiple new products. Helped Frontend team during the development and testing of the applications.

title: Designer and Developer
description: Led and formed a multidisciplinary team of developers and designers to maintain and improve the website.
Collaborated in multiple workshops as helper and teacher, forming hundreds of students on UX/UI Design and Web Development.

title: Creative Designer
description: Collaborated on web development and currently forming a team of developers on web development to migrate website from HTML to NextJS, improving scalability, reliability and speed and reducing development change rate by 200%
